tool_description: Roadsafetytips API provides a simple yet effective solution for accessing random road safety tips. Integrate it into your applications, websites, or platforms to encourage safe driving practices and enhance user awareness on the road.
name: Roadsafetytips
title: Roadsafetytips

api_list.name: Gets a specific road safety tip by id
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific road safety tip by id , id values range from 1 to 1,500

api_list.name: Get random road safety tip
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve a random road safety tip from a list of a diverse collection of engaging road safety tips gathered all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://roadsafetytips.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "roadsafetytips.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://roadsafetytips.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "roadsafetytips.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
